title: Why is level requirement needed for summoner spells?
body:
It's so dumb we should be able to use them all in all levels, I don't see the point of the level requirement. If you guys think a summoner spell is useless then remove it people will use what they want to use and won't use what they don't want to use don't force it upon us because you just want to.

someone explain this r%%%%%ation.

replies.body: The point of the level requirement is to slowly introduce those spells to newer players. If someone's never played a MOBA before, Flash would be much harder to use efficiently than Heal.
